service.name: hbase_regionserver_process_percent
service.label: Percent RegionServers Available
service.description: This service-level alert is triggered if the configured percentage of RegionServer processes cannot be determined to be up and listening on the network for the configured warning and critical thresholds. It aggregates the results of RegionServer process down checks.

HBASE_MASTER.name: hbase_master_process
HBASE_MASTER.label: HBase Master Process
HBASE_MASTER.description: This alert is triggered if the HBase master processes cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the network for the configured critical threshold, given in seconds.

HBASE_MASTER.name: hbase_master_cpu
HBASE_MASTER.label: HBase Master CPU Utilization
HBASE_MASTER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if CPU utilization of the HBase Master exceeds certain warning and critical thresholds. It checks the HBase Master JMX Servlet for the SystemCPULoad property. The threshold values are in percent.

HBASE_REGIONSERVER.name: hbase_regionserver_process
HBASE_REGIONSERVER.label: HBase RegionServer Process
HBASE_REGIONSERVER.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the RegionServer processes cannot be confirmed to be up and listening on the network for the configured critical threshold, given in seconds.
